meanings.definition: The branch of genetics that deals with the study of the structure and function of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: Cytogenetics helps scientists understand how chromosomes work.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use cytogenetics to study genetic disorders.
meanings.sent3: The students found the world of cytogenetics surprisingly fascinating.

meanings.definition: The study of the structure and function of chromosomes in relation to inherited traits.
meanings.sent1: Understanding cytogenetics can reveal how traits are passed down in families.
meanings.sent2: Cytogenetics plays a crucial role in understanding genetic inheritance.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a quirky character obsessed with cytogenetics.
meanings.sent4: In the world of genetics, cytogenetics shines a light on hereditary mysteries.
